response.overview: After a young mother murders her family in her own house, a detective attempts to investigate the mysterious case, only to discover that the house is cursed by a vengeful ghost. Now targeted by the demonic spirits, the detective must do anything to protect herself and her family from harm.
response.title: The Grudge

results.name: Easter Eggs You COMPLETELY Missed From The Grudge (2020)!
Behind the Scenes: The Cast of The Cursed discuss The Grudge (2020)
